thread.title: DSP to give up smoking
thread.title_full: DSP to give up smoking - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: DSP to give up smoking
text: Ace music composer Devi Sri Prasad has joined an anti smoking campaign called 'U quit, I quit', which helps people to overcome their addiction towards smoking, And he has also mentioned on his twitter account that if the movement resulted in people quiting smoking, then he too would kick the butt as well. His status read, "Dear Friends !! Are you ready to quit smoking?! If you do, I will quit a bad habit. Join the movement." (sic) He has joined a list of celebs to lend their support to this movement like Sunil Chettri, Mary Kom, Neil Nitin Mukesh and Rann Vijay.
